quiz.question: What is an example of earned media?
options: A journalist covering a product launch
quiz.answer: A journalist covering a product launch

quiz.question: Which paid media pricing model charges per completed action?
Which strategic move strengthens resilience against platform policy changes?
options: Diversifying channels and building owned audiences
Doubling spend on one dominant platform
quiz.answer: Diversifying channels and building owned audiences

quiz.question: What does 'target audience' refer to in campaign planning?
options: The specific group of customers a campaign aims to reach
The company stakeholders funding the campaign
quiz.answer: The specific group of customers a campaign aims to reach

quiz.question: What does 'CAC' measure in campaign economics?
Which multi-touch attribution method assigns credit proportionally across touchpoints?
What is a 'call to action' (CTA) in an ad?
options: A phrase prompting the audience to take a specific action
The design template used for the ad
The legal disclaimer at the bottom of an ad
quiz.answer: A phrase prompting the audience to take a specific action

quiz.question: Which qualitative method helps uncover customer motivations for campaigns?
Which ad safety approach prevents placements next to harmful content?
options: Brand safety controls and pre-bid filtering
quiz.answer: Brand safety controls and pre-bid filtering

quiz.question: What is A/B testing primarily used to determine?
options: Which version performs better with audiences
The legal ownership of creative assets
quiz.answer: Which version performs better with audiences

quiz.question: What is an advantage of marketing automation platforms?
Which advanced technique attributes revenue when consumers interact with many touchpoints over time?
options: Time-series based mixed attribution and experimental blending
quiz.answer: Time-series based mixed attribution and experimental blending

quiz.question: What is a marketing campaign primarily designed to achieve?
options: Increase brand awareness or drive customer action
quiz.answer: Increase brand awareness or drive customer action

quiz.question: Which attribution model gives all credit to the first touchpoint?
Which fraud type inflates ad metrics using non-human traffic?
